title: Imac 820 2784 A , 1 beep = no RAM installed
message:
Hey guys, 

This Imac 820 2784 A, beeps. i think is a no ram installed.. i switch 3 times memory rams 10600S, 8500S, and 8gb 1333... and dont top beeping.. 

how have i look?

title: Imac 820 2784 A , 1 beep = no RAM installed
message: Memory should be PC3-10600..... Try one slot at a time....

title: Imac 820 2784 A , 1 beep = no RAM installed
message:
i try in every slot with a PC3-10600 and don't work .. 

When i put the charger in the machine turn's on without push button. bios problem ?

title: Imac 820 2784 A , 1 beep = no RAM installed
Imac 820 2784 A , 1 beep = no RAM installed
message: Not sure on the exact models, but some iMacs need 2 slots filled to work. Try with 2 known good 10600 RAM sticks in left and right slots.

title: Imac 820 2784 A , 1 beep = no RAM installed
message: já mudou 2 sabe boa 10600 Ram como você disse. eu não sei o que fazer ... fuking problema como merda.
